milestones.title: AP CS Final Project
milestones.description: Simple catch falling objects game in Java.

milestones.title: Halite3
milestones.description: Used A*/Dijkstra algorithms in Halite3 competition.

milestones.title: Switched to Ubuntu
milestones.description: Switched to Ubuntu 16.04 for programming with VIM on Thinkpad; began self-hosting with Raspberry Pi.

milestones.title: Core CS Coursework
milestones.description: Completed all core university CS classes (100–300 level).

milestones.title: First Website
milestones.description: Created first website using NodeJS, ExpressJS, vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS. First devops experience, hosted on Digital Ocean using Docker.

milestones.title: Software Test Engineer at Zapways
milestones.description: Worked at Zapways in Irvine, CA. Refactored system to VueJS. Stack included .NET, Blazor, VueJS, SASS. Used Postman, Selenium, Redmine.

milestones.title: Automation at Zapways
milestones.description: Owned development of automated testing systems for website, OTA, and GDS platforms.

milestones.title: Returned to School
milestones.description: Left Zapways and resumed academic studies.

milestones.title: Completed General Education
milestones.description: Finished all previously skipped 100–200 level general education classes at Community College.

milestones.title: Returned to University
milestones.description: Re-enrolled to complete Computer Science degree. Tried Linux Mint, then switched back to Windows.

milestones.title: AI Model Research
milestones.description: Studied AI models: LR, DT, RF, SVM, KN, NN. Used Google Colab, Gemini, and scikit-learn.

milestones.title: DevOps & Cloud Tools
milestones.description: Worked with Terraform, Ansible, ANTLR, Conda to strengthen cloud infrastructure and devops skills.

milestones.title: Networking Fundamentals
milestones.description: Learned about Subnetting, DNS, Routing, Switches, and OSI Model (7 Layers).

milestones.title: Capstone Project
milestones.description: Led development of tournament system for USU Web App.

milestones.title: Bachelor's Degree
milestones.description: Completed Bachelor of Computer Science at California State University San Marcos.

milestones.title: Personal Website
milestones.description: Created this website using ReactJS, TailwindCSS, and hosted via Cloudflare.
